participant_1.background:
I play quarterback.
I play for the philadelphia eagles.
This is my second year in the league.
Last season i was just getting started.
This season , i will become a playoff quarterback.

participant_2.background:
I am only 5 foot tall.
I have a thick full beard.
My hair is as red as the sunset.
I have 8 brothers and we are close.
My parents are in there 80s.

content.text: What is something interesting about you?
I have 8 brothers and we are close
Wow, that's a lot of brothers! What is it like to be in such a big family?
It's always been really fun. We're always playing games, fighting, and just hanging out together.
That sounds like a great childhood.
It was! I'm really grateful for my brothers.
I'm sure they are grateful for you too.
I hope so.
What are some of your favorite memories with your brothers?

There are so many! But one of my favorites was when we were all kids and we went camping together. We slept in tents, roasted marshmallows over the campfire, and went swimming in the lake. It was so much fun.
That sounds like an amazing time.
It was! I'll never forget it.
What are some of your brothers like?

They're all really different, but they're all great people. My oldest brother is a doctor, my second oldest brother is a lawyer, my third oldest brother is a teacher, and my fourth oldest brother is a firefighter. My fifth oldest brother is a police officer, my sixth oldest brother is a construction worker, my seventh oldest brother is a mechanic, and my eighth oldest brother is a farmer.
Wow, that's a lot of different careers!
I know! It's amazing. I'm really proud of all of them.
I'm sure they're proud of you too.
I hope so.
What are your parents like?
They're both really great people. My dad is a retired firefighter and my mom is a retired teacher. They're both in their 80s and they're still going strong.
That's great to hear.
Yeah, I'm really lucky to have them as parents.
I'm sure they're really proud of you too.
I hope so.
